# action

**Instance Property**

The information style that the Apple Pay Later view presents.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var action: PKPayLaterAction { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property determines the kind of information modal the Apple Pay Later visual merchandising widget displays. The default is [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPayLaterAction/learnMore].

## Setting the user action

- **PKPayLaterAction**: Values you use to set the Apple Pay Later action.
